Invocation Name: smart home videos
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Simeon Tuitt Has Been Video Blogging Since 2006, This Smart Home TV Channel Is To Share His Passion For Smart Home Automation With People Interested In Smart Home Technology And Home Automation.

You Will Also Get To Enjoy Some Of Simeon Tuitt's Random And Daily Video Blogs Which May Contain A Tip, Thoughtful Message, Insight Or Just His Latest Smart Home Automation Video, Be Sure To Share The Channel.

You Can View Simeon Tuitt Smart Home Videos On Your Echo Show, Echo Spot, Fire TV And Listen To The Audio From The Videos On Your Echo Devices As Podcasts.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
